quotes.quote: If you don't have a plan, you're planning to fail
Why did the programmer quit his job? He didn't get arrays!
I told my wife she should embrace her mistakes. She gave me a hug.
Why did the physics teacher break up with the biology teacher? There was no chemistry.
Entropy isn't what it used to be.
Why did the mathematician throw his clock out the window? He wanted to see time fly.
I used to play piano by ear, but now I use my hands and fingers.
Parallel lines have so much in common. It's a shame they'll never meet.
I'm reading a book on anti-gravity. It's impossible to put down!
Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
The early bird might get the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
Why don't programmers like nature? It has too many bugs.
Have you tried eating a watch? I heard it is really time consuming.
